A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Raised on the original trilogy\, this might end up being my favorite Star Wars movie. It's not a better movie than The Empire Strikes Back\, but I think I like it more\, in some ways. The film takes your expectations the flips them\, which I appreciate. If you go into this expecting to be spoon-fed a generic three-act popcorn story\, you're not going to like it. You need to think about what you're watching: the motivations for the characters and why the filmmakers chose to make the decisions they did.
